pitch.cc: Kyle McClellan is really trying to keep Joey Votto close; he is 12-for-16 in stolen base attempts this season.
That was pitch number 15 for Kyle McClellan; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .204 average in the first 15 pitches but they hit .254 off him after that.
